english.segment2: I could see it was a rough cut Tuesday. Slow motion weekdays stare me down. His perfect picture got me wound. Snap shot image froze without a sound
english.segment3: Thursday morning was a pop shot factor. His face still focused in my mind. Friday night we'll dance the spotlight line. Stop time heart for me if he's not mine
english.segment4: Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame
english.segment5: Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame, And I'll Freeze
english.segment6: Now I'm looking at a flashback Sunday. Zoom lens feelings just wont disappear. Closer for an image look so clear. His hold on me has got so strong. This freeze frame moment cant be wrong
english.segment7: Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame
english.segment8: Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame, And I'll Freeze
english.segment9: Oh Yeah, Snap shot image froze without a sound
english.segment10: Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame
english.segment11: Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame
english.segment12: Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame, Freeze Frame
